author: joernkottmann
msg: The checkOutputFile method now validates all known cases to ensure its possible to write the file. The modifications are done based on input (and patch) from James Kosin, for furhter informatin see Patch ID: 3023103.

author: joernkottmann
msg: The output file check needs a file name for the error message. The name of the file was changed to be component name + model e.g. "sentence detector model".

author: joernkottmann
msg: Applied patch from James Kosin (3023103, CheckOutputFirst.patch). The patch adds checks to validate the model output file before training.

author: joernkottmann
msg: Now uses single simple tokenizer instance.
